articles.author: NPR's International Desk
articles.title: American DRC coup plotters are on their way back to U.S. - NPR
articles.description: The three young men, who were sentenced to death for their part in an attempted coup in the Democratic Republic of Congo last May, were handed over to U.S. authorities and are on their way to the U.S.
articles.content: Three Americans sentenced to death in the Democratic Republic of Congo for their role in a failed coup last year in the central African country have been returned to the United States, a Congolese go… [+3448 chars]

articles.title: Trump's foreign policies: What do Americans think? - BBC
articles.description: Most Americans do not believe the US should try to take over Greenland or Gaza, a Pew Research survey suggests.
articles.content:
Tiffany Wertheimer
In his first few weeks back in the Oval Office, US President Donald Trump made several extraordinary decisions on foreign policy.
